job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Job DescriptionMajor purpose: This engineer will need experience in SW design, digital communications, modems, and FPGA design.Areas of desired experience or education include:â¢ Forward Error Correction (FEC)â¢ Modulationâ¢ Demodulationâ¢ Digital filtersâ¢ Baseband samplingâ¢ Acquisitionâ¢ Tracking AlgorithmsMajor functions: Technical/Functional skills: Education/Experience/Licenses etc.:	Qualifications:â¢ Bachelorâs (Masterâs preferred) degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering or Electrical Engineering.â¢ 4+ years of experience implementing complex modem algorithms in DSP software.â¢ 4+ years of equivalent experience in FPGA design with SW background will also receive considerationâ¢ Preferred Skills:â¢ Expertise in C++ and object-oriented software designâ¢ Expertise in software design for testabilityâ¢ Expertise in laboratory debug techniques using digital scopes, logic analyzers, BERTS & other complex measurement equipmentâ¢ Experience with TI DSP BIOS RTOS is a plus.â¢ Familiarity with Git is a plusâ¢ Familiarity with VHDL/Verilog and Matlab/Simulink is a plus
